path.style: stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 1 8 16 8 1 20; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

polygon.style: stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(0,134,255); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(0,134,255); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

text.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(0,0,0); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
